description: A legendary swordswoman from Natlan, Ifa is rumored to command the power of Electro and swift swordplay.
info: Ifa is a speculative Electro sword DPS from Natlan. Build her for Electro DMG, CRIT, and ATK%.

skills.name: Normal Attack: Thunderclap Edge
skills.desc: Performs up to 5 consecutive Electro sword strikes.
skills.details_html:
Normal Attack
Performs up to 5 consecutive Electro sword strikes.
Charged Attack
Consumes stamina to unleash two rapid Electro slashes.
Plunging Attack
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, dealing AoE Electro DMG upon impact.

skills.name: Storm Surge
skills.desc: Ifa dashes forward, dealing AoE Electro DMG and increasing her ATK.
skills.details_html:
Storm Surge
Dashes forward, dealing AoE Electro DMG and increasing Ifa's ATK for a short duration.

skills.name: Judgment Flash
skills.desc: Ifa unleashes a powerful Electro slash, dealing massive AoE Electro DMG and granting all allies increased Electro DMG Bonus.
skills.details_html:
Judgment Flash
Unleashes a powerful Electro slash, dealing massive AoE Electro DMG and granting all allies increased Electro DMG Bonus for a short duration.

passive_talents.name: Lightning Focus
passive_talents.desc: After using Storm Surge, Ifa's Electro DMG is increased by 20% for 10s.

passive_talents.name: Sword of Natlan
passive_talents.desc: Allies affected by Judgment Flash gain 20% increased ATK.

passive_talents.name: Swift Step
passive_talents.desc: When Ifa is in the party, sprinting stamina consumption is reduced by 20%.

constellations.name: C2: Flashing Zeal
constellations.desc: After using Judgment Flash, Ifa's CRIT Rate is increased by 10% for 8s.

constellations.name: C3: Electro Ascendant
constellations.desc: Increases the level of Storm Surge by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: C4: Storm’s Blessing
constellations.desc: Allies affected by Judgment Flash gain 20% increased Energy Recharge.

constellations.name: C5: Judgment’s Embrace
constellations.desc: Increases the level of Judgment Flash by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: C6: Natlan’s Storm
constellations.desc: When Ifa triggers an Electro-related reaction, her ATK is increased by 20% for 10s.
